name: Curse of GLoBall
description:
GLoBall had been cursed. Control GLoBall to dodge enemies and shoot them up before you run out of health. Arm yourself with powerful skills as you level up. Be cautious with your jumps and timing them properly as traps may get you.

How to play:

Mouse to aim and Left Mouse Button to shoot

Space to Jump & WASD/Arrow keys to control GLoBall around the map

Have fun playing!

Sounds from BFXR. Rest all was made from scratch.
